entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Webequie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:07 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 15.
